org.waarp.ftp.simpleimpl.file
Class SimpleAuth

java.lang.Object
  org.waarp.ftp.simpleimpl.file.SimpleAuth

public class SimpleAuth
extends Object

Simple Authentication based on a previously load XML file. Not to be used in production!

Author:
Frederic Bregier
